**As a** [role]  
**I need** [function]  
**So that** [benefit]  
      
### Details and Assumptions
    * [document what you know]      

### Acceptance Criteria     
    gherkin 
    Given [some context]
    When [certain action is taken]
    Then [the outcome of action is observed]
